[vc_row el_class=”section-full p-tb90 bg-gray square_shape2″ css=”.vc_custom_1542364216325{background-color: #f6f7f8 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

FAQ

[/vc_column_text][vc_tta_accordion style=”outline” color=”juicy-pink” gap=”10″ active_section=”1587640984191-73b0c056-0312″ collapsible_all=”true”][vc_tta_section title=”Why NICHE?” tab_id=”1587640984191-73b0c056-0312″][vc_column_text]Niche Design Loft has built a trustworthy and reliable name for itself since its inception in 2016. Equipped with a team of award-winning architects, engineers and full service factories, Niche provides innovative, functional and high quality interiors at an affordable price, with on-time delivery and impeccable customer service upon handing over.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Who will design my home?” tab_id=”1587640984209-b00e427d-336b”][vc_column_text]Niche has a panel of reputed architects and interior designers handpicked and appraised to handle any requirement put forth by the customer. Niche would assign a designer/architect to the customer based on their requirements, lifestyle and functionalities.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How long would it take for my home to be designed and executed?” tab_id=”1587642576171-c54e71d1-5883″][vc_column_text]Each home is different and each customer is unique. Depending on your tastes, requirements, lifestyles and budgets, our designer will work with you to design your home as swiftly as she/he can subject to your availability. Upon finalising the design, you will be presented with a timeline for the execution. Niche prides itself with an excellent record for handing over houses within the specified timeline.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How does the process work?” tab_id=”1587642601201-2d1ed78c-7331″][vc_column_text]Once you present your floor plan to the designer, a design proposal (which would include space planning, reference images, colour palettes and a tentative estimate) would be presented to the customer. Once all these are finalised, we would move into designing your space.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What will be the payment structure?” tab_id=”1587642636507-809b291b-4bc6″][vc_column_text]
Initial Payment10% of initial estimate
Upon completion of design20%
Commencement of manufacturing30%
Upon delivery in site20%
Upon installation20%
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Does Niche Design Loft offer warranty?” tab_id=”1587643343247-86054cf1-1555″][vc_column_text]Yes, Niche offers upto 5-years warranty on its products, subject to conditions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
